name: Utopias
description:
Utopias: Navigating Without Coordinates is a videogame network of nine worlds - each one a personal utopia developed by a member of AAA Collective. By connecting our utopias, we draw attention to their conflicting ideals. Is a collective utopia possible? Can different utopias co-exist, or does their idealism render them totalitarian?

!Coming soon¡ https://aaasoftwa.re/utopias
